title: Branded - A Western Romance
description: The Dalton motto is every brother for himself.Ex-bounty hunter, Slade Dalton, is staking a claim to the family spread, the Lazy Heart Ranch. In residence is a sassy handful. Slade covets his brother's fianc√©e. He's determined to convince Lacey she's chosen the wrong Dalton. Lacey is content to settle for a future without passion until she meets her sinfully masculine brother-in-law to be.Branded is approximately 91,000 words long.This book was previously published, but has been revised.Warning, this title has a few erotic scenes featuring the graphic language, explicit sex, and spanking.
author: Scottie Barrett
